author: 0w3n6325
content:
<@&1416139337179074590> Hi, I work on the titanrelay. I'm trying to research ways that we can improve block propagation. Quite a lot of blocks on mainnet are first gossiped onto the network from our nodes.

Could someone hook me up with access to the Xatu clickhouse so I can measure how long it takes for nodes to receive our blocks?
